com.ibm.opencard.terminal.pcsc10
Class Pcsc10LockableTerminal

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--opencard.core.terminal.CardTerminal
        |
        +--opencard.opt.terminal.AbstractLockableTerminal
              |
              +--com.ibm.opencard.terminal.pcsc10.Pcsc10LockableTerminal
public final class Pcsc10LockableTerminal
extends opencard.opt.terminal.AbstractLockableTerminal
implements opencard.opt.terminal.TerminalCommand, opencard.core.terminal.Pollable

Implementation of a lockable OpenCard CardTerminal for PCSC.

getCardID

public opencard.core.terminal.CardID getCardID(int slot)
                                        throws opencard.core.terminal.CardTerminalException
Return the CardID of the presently inserted card. Will returned the cached card if slot's status has not changed; otherwise it will really retrieve the CardID.

Parameters:
slot - slot number
Returns:
A CardID object representing the inserted smart card.
Throws:
opencard.core.terminal.CardTerminalException - thrown when problem occured getting the ATR of the card
Overrides:
getCardID in class opencard.core.terminal.CardTerminal
